timeline.bodyText: This is not needed as the AttributeDefinition has default value ModelNode.TRUE.
timeline.author: bstansberry

timeline.message:
[WFLY-13226]: Upgrade Apache Artemis to 2.16.0

 * Upgrading Apache Artemis version to 2.16.0
 * journal now needs to be able to load json.
 * Adding support for the SSLProviderFactory
 * Fixing change in BroadcastGroupControlHandler due to ARTEMIS-2749.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13226

[WFLY-13226]: Upgrade Apache Artemis to 2.16.0

 * Fixing change in BroadcastGroupControlHandler due to ARTEMIS-2749.

Jira: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13226
